title: Explore data in the Global Integrated Power Tracker
footer: All data comes from GEM's [Global Integrated Power Tracker](https://globalenergymonitor.org/projects/global-integrated-power-tracker/), last updated in July 2024. Units on this page are in gigawatts (GW).

dropdown.overall_summary: The United States has more than **five times** as much clean power in construction than fossil fuel capacity.
The UK has 13 GW of clean energy under construction, most of it wind power.
